message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40.  It's better to get something now than risk losing it to inflation.
I think we can both do better.  Let's split it more evenly.  I'll take $55, you take $45.
I understand you want a fair split, but the value decreases with each round. I'll take $55, and you get $45.  It's the same offer you just made, but time is on my side.
